sourcesContent:
'use client'; import React from 'react'; import { Swiper, SwiperSlide } from 'swiper/react'; import { Navigation } from 'swiper/modules'; import data from '../../../data/testimonials.json'; function Testimonials() { const swiperOptions = { modules: [Navigation], spaceBetween: 30, speed: 1000, loop: true, navigation: { nextEl: '.swiper-arrow-control .swiper-button-next', prevEl: '.swiper-arrow-control .swiper-button-prev', }, breakpoints: { // when window width is >= 640px 640: { loop: true, slidesPerView: 1, spaceBetween: 20, centeredSlides: false, }, // when window width is >= 768px 768: { loop: true, slidesPerView: 1, spaceBetween: 30, centeredSlides: false, }, // when window width is >= 1200px 1200: { loop: true, slidesPerView: 1, spaceBetween: 30, centeredSlides: false, }, }, }; return (
Testimonials

What People Say?

{data.slice(0, 2).map((item, i) => (

{item.desc}

{item.name}
{item.subName}
))}
); } export default Testimonials;
